contact-posts.title: Bless Your Heart, Magnet.
contact-posts.message: Thank you for providing an incredible service. I actually didn't come here to complain, but to instead shower you in love and praise. I hope Magnet succeeds where others have failed.

contact-posts.title: How does Magnet Make Money?
contact-posts.message: Does anyone else find it weird that this service is 100% free, yet somehow Magnet is still in business? I read a conspiracy online that this is a honeypot funded by the US government to force people to do free unpaid labor. Seems ridiculous!!! Anyways my cash app is $samsw0rLd666 please pay me üôè
